participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and hardworking, Jake enjoys hands-on work and has a nurturing side towards his pets.
participant_1.background: i've 5cats. i am a construction worker. my cats are very special to me. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, Luna has a playful spirit but often feels isolated in her cloud world.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.

content.text: What do i supposed to do
build houses and build houses. do you like construction?
